entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5 except zero in a few localities.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 5 except zero in a few localities. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:35 PM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023
